trans-unit.source: Classes that derive from this abstract base class define 3D geometric shapes.
trans-unit.target: 衍生自這個抽象基底類別的類別會定義 3D 幾何圖形。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D" /> class of objects can be used for hit-testing and rendering 3D graphic data.
trans-unit.target: 物件的 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D" /> 類別可以用於進行 3D 圖形資料的點擊測試和呈現。

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D> by itself has no appearance.
trans-unit.target: A<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D>單獨使用時有任何的外觀。

trans-unit.source: To render a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D>, use a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D> to combine the <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D> with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material>.
trans-unit.target: 要呈現<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D>，使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>結合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D>與<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material>。

trans-unit.source: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D> is the concrete instance of a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D>.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D> 具象執行個體<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D>。

trans-unit.source: To render a 3D shape, compose a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D> by specifying a MeshGeometry3D and a Material.
trans-unit.target: 若要呈現 3D 圖形，撰寫<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>藉由指定 MeshGeometry3D 和材質。

trans-unit.source: The following example illustrates how a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D> is combined with a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material> using a <xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>.
trans-unit.target: 下列範例說明如何<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.MeshGeometry3D>結合<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Material>使用<xref:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.GeometryModel3D>。

trans-unit.source: Gets a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D" /> that specifies the axis-aligned bounding box of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D" />.
trans-unit.target: 取得 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D" />，它會指定這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D" /> 與軸對齊的週框方塊。

trans-unit.source: Bounding <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D" /> for the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D" />.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Rect3D" /> 的週框 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D" />。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D" />, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D" /> 的可修改複製品，深層複製這個物件的值。

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: 當複製相依性屬性時，這個方法會複製資源參考和資料繫結 (但可能無法再解析)，但不會複製動畫或它們目前的值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true." />
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="true." />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="false" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D" /> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: 建立這個 <see cref="T:System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Geometry3D" /> 物件的可修改複製品，製作這個物件目前值的深層複本。

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: 不會複製資源參考、資料繫結和動畫，但是會複製其目前值。

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: 目前物件的可修改複本。

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property will be <see langword="false" /> even if the source's <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> property was <see langword="true" />.
trans-unit.target: 即使來源的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性為 <see langword="false" />，複製物件的 <see cref="P:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen" /> 屬性將仍為 <see langword="true" />。

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: 這個方法用來產生的可修改複本凍結<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件 (或任何<xref:System.Windows.Freezable>物件)。

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: 為了方便起見，這個方法會遮蔽強型別實作繼承的版本。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱<xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=nameWithType>。
